snippet.title: Block'Em game - Announcement Trailer 2021
snippet.description:
Block'Em! is an action-filled block-building party game for 2 to 4 players! The controls are simple but the road to victory is complex: be the first to reach the goal or be the last Blocky standing! Block'Em! mixes platforming and puzzles in the most exciting way.

- Build, jump and push your way to victory!
- Undo each other's progress!
- Up to 4 players in local and online multiplayer!
- Play with friends, challenge your partner or duke it out within the family!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1529220/BlockEm/

https://www.blockemgame.com/

Socials!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WimasimaCom
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wimasimagames
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wimasima
LinkedIn: https://se.linkedin.com/company/aurora-punks
